body: This PR adds a link to the documentation on `spack view` from the [Command Index](http://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/command_index.html). @samfux84 had trouble finding this documentation (see https://github.com/LLNL/spack/issues/4080#issuecomment-298632647) but this should help.
title: Add link to spack view docs in command index
